UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user in the AITAM Connect system.

name.description: Full name or preferred name of the user.

profileImageUrl.description: URL to the user's profile image.

totalRespondedQuestions.description: A count of how many questions the user has contributed a consolidated answer to.

linkedin.description: URL to the user's LinkedIn profile.

specialization.description: The user's domain of expertise or specialization.

achievements.description: A list of the user's notable achievements.

projects.description: A list of projects the user has worked on.

Question.title: Question
Question.description: Represents a question asked by a user.

authorId.description: The ID of the user who asked the question.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the question was created.

status.description: The lifecycle status of the question.

aiStatus.description: The status of the AI answer synthesis process.

description.description: The detailed description of the question.

answerCount.description: The number of raw answers submitted.

consolidatedAnswer.description: The final AI-generated answer in Markdown format.

Answer.title: Answer
Answer.description: Represents a raw answer submitted by a user to a question.

authorId.description: The ID of the user who submitted the answer.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the answer was submitted.

answerText.description: The text content of the answer.

status.description: The processing status of the raw answer.

/questions/{questionId}.description: Stores the main question document, including the final consolidated answer.

/questions/{questionId}/answers/{answerI.description: Subcollection for storing all raw answers submitted for a question before AI synthesis.
